item.title: Amy add a quote by Ayn Rand
Amy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Amy add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody’s going to know whether you did it or not." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Amy add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Amy add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "A woman must have money and a room of her own if she is to write fiction." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Amy add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "To get to a place where you could love anything you chose--not to need permission for desire--well now _that_ was freedom." -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Amy add a quote by Wayne W. Dyer
item.description: "Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change." -- Wayne W. Dyer

item.title: Amy add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Amy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I am burdened with what the Buddhists call the 'monkey mind' -- the thoughts that swing from limb to limb, stopping only to scratch themselves, spit and howl." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Amy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Amy add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "If it means something, take it to heart. If it means nothing, it's nothing. Let it go." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Amy add a quote by Dave Ramsey
item.description: "If you will live like no one else, later you can live like no one else." -- Dave Ramsey

item.title: Amy add a quote by Dave Ramsey
item.description: "We buy things we don't need with money we don't have to impress people we don't like." -- Dave Ramsey

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anna Quindlen
item.description: "The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself." -- Anna Quindlen

item.title: Amy add a quote by Robin Sharma
item.description: "The smallest of actions is always better than the noblest of intentions." -- Robin Sharma

item.title: Amy add a quote by Frank McCourt
item.description: "It’s lovely to know that the world can’t interfere with the inside of your head." -- Frank McCourt

item.title: Amy add a quote by Charlotte Bronte
item.description: "I have for the first time found what I can truly love–I have found you. You are my sympathy–my better self–my good angel–I am bound to you with a strong attachment. I think you good, gifted, lovely: a fervent, a solemn passion is conceived in my heart; it leans to you, draws you to my centre and spring of life, wrap my existence about you–and, kindling in pure, powerful flame, fuses you and me in one." -- Charlotte Bronte
